mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
headImg = #{headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headImg = #{headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user
AND username like concat(concat("%",#{username}),"%")
AND nickname like concat(concat("%",#{nickname}),"%")
